docs.snippet: TRENTON, Feb. 17 Fortyfive cases of trichinosis were reported in New Jersey last year, and state health officials said today that they probably resulted from the grinding up of pork in hamburger by some meat markets....
docs.lead_paragraph: TRENTON, Feb. 17 Fortyfive cases of trichinosis were reported in New Jersey last year, and state health officials said today that they probably resulted from the grinding up of pork in hamburger by some meat markets.
docs.abstract: 45 cases of trichinosis were reptd in NJ in '75 and NJ health officials say that they probably resulted from grinding up of pork in hamburger by some meat mkts; NJ Health Dept repts that more than 1/4 of 102 batches of ground beef tested in random survey of NJ mkts had pork in them; NJ Consumer Health Services Dir Oscar Sussman and NJ Health Comr Joanne E Finley comment (M)

headline.main: Trichinosis Is Laid to Pork in Hamburger

docs.snippet: LOS ANGELES, Feb. 17 "One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest," the filmed version of Ken Kesey's novel about one man's battle for sanity in a mental institution, received today nine Academy Award nominations, the most for any new film of 1975....
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, Feb. 17 "One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest," the filmed version of Ken Kesey's novel about one man's battle for sanity in a mental institution, received today nine Academy Award nominations, the most for any new film of 1975.

headline.main: 'CUCKOO' LEADS OSCAR NOMINEES; Named in 9 Categories  Nicholson, Louise Fletcher Up for Top Awards

docs.snippet: Of the 18 teams in the National Basketball Association, six have winning records. Three of those--the Boston Celtics, Buffalo Braves and Philadelphia 76ers--play  in the Atlantic Division, and only the Golden State Warriors have a winning mark in ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Of the 18 teams in the National Basketball Association, six have winning records. Three of those--the Boston Celtics, Buffalo Braves and Philadelphia 76ers--play in the Atlantic Division, and only the Golden State Warriors have a winning mark in the nine-team Western Conference. To some the statistical oddities leave the N.B.A.'s credibility open to questions.

docs.snippet: PRINCETON "IT'S a strange feeling," says Peter Benchley,  "having people loathe you, hate your guts, in the abstract, when they haven't even met you. You don't have a chance to explain, pre  sent your side of it, argue that, really, I'm not such a...
docs.lead_paragraph: PRINCETON "IT'S a strange feeling," says Peter Benchley, "having people loathe you, hate your guts, in the abstract, when they haven't even met you. You don't have a chance to explain, pre sent your side of it, argue that, really, I'm not such a rotten guy."

headline.main: Peter Benchley: Success Is a Man-eater; Benchley: Success Is a Man-eater

docs.snippet: IT wasn't until Tuesday morning that Panel E became a cog in the slowly grinding gears of the Essex County petit jury mill in Newark. Most of us had come the day before, making our way to the new granite court  house on West Market Street through ...
docs.lead_paragraph: IT wasn't until Tuesday morning that Panel E became a cog in the slowly grinding gears of the Essex County petit jury mill in Newark. Most of us had come the day before, making our way to the new granite court house on West Market Street through a vicious snow and ice storm, only to be told that jury duty had been called off for the day.

headline.main: ABOUT NEW JERSEY; Welcome To Jury Duty
